Components

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Menus

Menus help group related information.

Tip

Be sure that the input's type is checkbox and that each of the input's ids match their label's for!

  • Macaroon
  • Shaved Ice
  • Specials
    • Classic
    • Taro
    • Jasmine
  • Cold Brew
  • Hot Tea
<div class="menu">
    <input type="checkbox" id="first-menu" name="menu-checkbox" hidden checked />
    <label class="menu-header" for="first-menu">
        Food
    </label>
    <div class="menu-body">
        <ul class="menu-list">
            <li>Macaroon</li>
            <li>Shaved Ice</li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="menu">
    <input type="checkbox" id="second-menu" name="menu-checkbox" hidden checked />
    <label class="menu-header" for="second-menu">
        Drinks
    </label>
    <div class="menu-body">
        <ul class="menu-list">
            <li>Specials</li>

            <!-- Nest menus using the nested-menu class! -->
            <li class="nested-menu">
                <div class="menu">
                    <input type="checkbox" id="nested-menu" name="menu-checkbox" hidden />
                    <label class="menu-header" for="nested-menu">
                        Milk Tea (Click me!)
                    </label>
                    <div class="menu-body">
                        <ul class="menu-list">
                            <li>Classic</li>
                            <li>Taro</li>
                            <li>Jasmine</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li>

            <li>Cold Brew</li>
            <li>Hot Tea</li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

Colors

Easily change the colors of your menu using boba's brilliant color palette.
  • Macaroon
  • Shaved Ice
  • Specials
    • Classic
    • Taro
    • Jasmine
  • Cold Brew
  • Hot Tea
<div class="menu pink">
    <input type="checkbox" id="first-color-menu" name="color-menu-checkbox" hidden checked />
    <label class="menu-header" for="first-color-menu">
        Food
    </label>
    <div class="menu-body">
        <ul class="menu-list">
            <li>Macaroon</li>
            <li>Shaved Ice</li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="menu purple">
    <input type="checkbox" id="second-color-menu" name="color-menu-checkbox" hidden checked />
    <label class="menu-header" for="second-color-menu">
        Drinks
    </label>
    <div class="menu-body">
        <ul class="menu-list">
            <li>Specials</li>

            <!-- Nest menus using the nested-menu class! -->            
            <li class="nested-menu">
                <div class="menu">
                    <input type="checkbox" id="nested-color-menu" name="color-menu-checkbox" hidden />
                    <label class="menu-header" for="nested-color-menu">
                        Milk Tea (Click me!)
                    </label>
                    <div class="menu-body">
                        <ul class="menu-list">
                            <li>Classic</li>
                            <li>Taro</li>
                            <li>Jasmine</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li>

            <li>Cold Brew</li>
            <li>Hot Tea</li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>
